# IOutputResultData.GetUnCompressedOutputStream method

Returns a reference to the uncompressed output stream. If [`OutputType`](./OutputType.md) is Pdf this value is equals to OutputStream value property.

```csharp
public Stream GetUnCompressedOutputStream()
```

## Return Value

A Stream that contains the original outupt uncrompressed.
